str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 2nd Person Plural
str2: Your, yours. From humeis; yours, i.e. Pertaining to you.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Always, at all times, ever. From pas and hote; every when, i.e. At all times.
Ready, prepared. From an old noun heteos; adjusted, i.e. Ready.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
Not yet. From ou and po; not yet.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and eimi; to be near, i.e. At hand; neuter present participle time being, or property.
